entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
